forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 24, with temperatures falling to around 22 in the afternoon. South southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow after 1am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 18, with temperatures rising to around 22 overnight. South southeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow before 1pm, then snow and a slight chance of freezing drizzle between 1pm and 2pm, then snow and a slight chance of sleet and a slight chance of freezing drizzle and a slight chance of drizzle. Cloudy, with a high near 33. East southeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow and a slight chance of freezing drizzle before 7pm, then freezing rain and rain and snow between 7pm and 10pm, then snow and freezing rain. Cloudy, with a low around 26. Northeast wind 5 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 14, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails. No trails on the golf course.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  For today, February 14, 2025 grooming for classic ski only will take place on Coyote Run while Hawks Hill will be rolled only.  Our staff will be assessing all other trails today and possibly be rolling if conditions permit.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be open on 2/15 and 2/16.  Golf course and Shelden Trails are currently groomed.  Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Buck's run is in great shape. deep classic tracks. golf course has been rolled but still soft but skiable. conditions should firm up and provide great skiing this weekend. enjoy!

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Being the very first on the groom today , I am biased : but boy oh boy it is nice at Nubs Nob ! LF 6

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 7 lifts, Rope Tow, and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. All trails are groomed and tracked.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM. Special night skiing session on this Sunday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Happy Valentine's Day from all of us at Nub's Nob. Two inches of snow fell at Nub's Nob yesterday and conditions continue to be mid-winter excellent. All runs are open along with all of the XC and snowshoe trails. The temperature is forecast to hit the mid-20's this afternoon. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM with an hour break at 4:30 to groom for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob!
